title: Mental Health Referral (Standard)
entry_criteria: Moderate to severe mental health difficulties affecting daily functioning.
prompt_instruction: Draft a formal clinical referral letter. Focus on: 1. Duration of symptoms (>6 months?), 2. Impact on daily functioning, 3. Risk assessment. Use medical terminology.

title: Communication Needs Referral
entry_criteria: Significant delay in receptive or expressive language not explained by hearing loss.
prompt_instruction: Draft a referral for assessment. Highlight discrepancies between Verbal and Non-Verbal scores if available. Describe functional impact in the classroom.

title: Safeguarding / Social Care Referral
entry_criteria: Immediate concerns regarding significant harm or neglect.
prompt_instruction: URGENT SAFEGUARDING REFERRAL. State facts only. Do not interpret. Include dates, times, and direct quotes from the child. Follow 'Working Together to Safeguard Children' protocols.

title: Family Support & Early Help Request
entry_criteria: Family requires support with housing, finance, or parenting strategies preventing escalation to social care.
prompt_instruction: Draft a 'Request for Early Help'. Focus on the family context, systemic barriers, and the specific support required (e.g., Family Support Worker), emphasizing prevention of escalation.

title: Medical / Neurodevelopmental Referral
entry_criteria: Concerns regarding neurodevelopmental conditions (ASD/ADHD) or physical health impacting learning.
prompt_instruction: Request for neurodevelopmental assessment (e.g. ASD/ADHD pathway). Summarize school-based evidence and graduated response (Plan-Do-Review) history.
